artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Gold & orange warp. Green, tan & metallic gold weft forms bands.Mount labeled "H-8A (orange, green, yellow,tan, gold metallic)

title: Pomegranate
